com.xilinx.rapidwright.bitstream

Class BitstreamHeader

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.bitstream.BitstreamHeader

  • public class BitstreamHeader
extends Object
    Represents the header of a bitstream file (.bit). This includes everything up to and including the sync word.
    Since:
    2020.2.1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte[] BUS_WIDTH_AUTO_DETECT1 
      static byte[] BUS_WIDTH_AUTO_DETECT2 
      static byte[] DUMMY_WORD 
      static byte[] INIT_HEADER 
      static byte[] SYNC_WORD
      Common SYNC word, terminates a header

      Gets the part name as stored in the bitstream header

      • isSeries7

        public boolean isSeries7()
        Convenience method to check if this bitstream targets a Series 7 device
        Returns:
        True if the device is from the series 7 set of devices, false otherwise
        Since:
        2020.2.1
